backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for a Jewellery Order Management System that manages orders, design mappings, karigars, and blob storage with operations for creating, supplying, returning, and status-updating orders.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels, covering RB order partial-supply recalculation, return-to-pending restoration, and row consolidation logic.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short summaries describing each file's role and recent changes, serving as a build/documentation reference for the frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, sidebar, chart colors, etc.).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA titled 'Jewellery Order Management System' that mounts the app at `#root` and loads `src/main.tsx`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application component that sets up TanStack Router with all page routes, wraps the app in QueryClient, ThemeProvider, and SidebarProvider, and renders the shared layout with AppSidebar.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Custom: Dashboard tab that fetches all orders and displays only CO-type Pending orders, with a search input filtering by order number, design code, or generic name.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Design: A modal dialog component that displays a zoomable and pannable design image fetched by design code, with support for mouse and touch interactions.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Hallma: A dashboard tab showing orders in Hallmark status with filtering by type, karigar, date range, and search text, plus bulk status update and Excel export functionality.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Kariga: A dashboard tab that groups pending orders by karigar name into cards showing order count and total weight, with navigation to individual karigar detail pages.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OrderT: A reusable order table component supporting bulk selection, mark-as-ready actions, delete, and multi-format export (Excel, PDF, JPEG), with a design image modal on design code click.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/ReadyT: A dashboard tab displaying ready orders grouped by order number with search, bulk selection, and a return-to-pending action that computes total quantities before calling the backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Summar: Renders summary metric cards (total orders, weight, quantity, customer orders) for the active dashboard tab, with deduplication logic for RB orders and partial-supply exclusion.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Suppli: A dialog component that allows users to enter supplied quantities for Regional Buffer (RB) orders, validates input against ordered quantities, and submits a batch supply mutation on confirmation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TotalO: A dashboard tab that displays pending orders grouped by design code, consolidates RB order fragments into single rows, and supports bulk mark-as-ready or supply actions with search and selection.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Unmapp: An alert section that fetches and displays unmapped design codes (missing generic or karigar names), grouped by design, with navigation buttons to resolve them.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppSideba: The application sidebar component that renders navigation menu items with active-state highlighting and includes a data reset dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/layout/DataReset: A confirmation alert dialog that permanently deletes all active (Pending, Ready, Return from Hallmark) orders via a reset mutation with success/error toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/masterdesigns/Ed: A modal dialog for editing a design's karigar assignment, supporting selection from existing karigars or adding a new one, and saving the updated mapping with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/tagprinting/Webv: An empty file with no content or implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A custom hook that creates and caches an Internet Computer actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via an AuthClient wrapper.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including orders, karigars, master designs, and reconciliation records.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AgeingStock.tsx: Page component that displays pending orders grouped by design code with age-band color coding (green/yellow/red) and supports bulk marking orders as ready.
frontend/src/pages/BarcodeScanning.tsx: Page component that supports scanning order barcodes via hardware scanner or camera, collecting scanned IDs and batch-updating their status.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page that renders summary cards and tabbed views for total orders, ready, hallmark, customer orders, and karigars sections.
frontend/src/pages/DesignImages.tsx: Page component for uploading design images to the backend, supporting both folder selection and ZIP file extraction, processing images in batches and mapping filenames to design codes.
frontend/src/pages/IngestOrders.tsx: Page component for uploading orders from an Excel file, parsing them, and saving them to the backend in batches of 50 with progress tracking and error reporting.
frontend/src/pages/KarigarDetail.tsx: Page component displaying pending orders for a specific karigar, with support for exporting orders as PDF/JPEG/Excel and marking orders as ready, including a dialog for RB-type orders.
frontend/src/pages/MasterDesigns.tsx: Page component for uploading and managing master design mappings from an Excel file, displaying a table of design-to-karigar mappings with editing capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/Reconciliation.tsx: Page component for reconciling a master Excel file against existing orders, parsing the file, displaying matched/unmatched results in a table, and persisting selected reconciled rows to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/TagPrinting.tsx: A page component that displays ready orders grouped by design code for tag printing, supporting date range filtering, bulk selection, clipboard copying of order numbers, and a hallmark status update dialog.
frontend/src/pages/UnmappedCodes.tsx: A page component that lists orders missing generic name or karigar mappings, grouped by design code, with inline editing to update or reassign design mappings.
frontend/src/utils/excelParser.ts: Utility module for parsing Excel order files, providing helpers to normalize design codes, extract strings/numbers, and convert Excel serial dates or DD/MM/YYYY strings to epoch milliseconds.
frontend/src/utils/exportUtils.ts: Utility module for exporting order data to Excel (via SheetJS) or PDF (via dynamically generated HTML with embedded design images fetched from the backend actor), with mobile/iOS detection helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that sets up dark mode, custom container sizes, extended color tokens (using OKLCH CSS variables), font families, border radii, and includes typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state (version 3) for an order management system with SO/CO/RB order types, documenting existing features, known issues around RB partial supply flow, summary card recalculation, and mandatory row consolidation logic.
